name: Chasing Tales: Wossaul the Giant
requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood shield and perform tasks to re-create Wossaul's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Wossaul the Giant.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Wossaul: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Wossaul: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Wossaul: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Wossaul at a heroic font.
